intro: Stomadena violacea, commonly known as violetleaf stoma, is a flowering plant native to the Caribbean and parts of South America. It thrives in moist, shaded environments and is often found in tropical and subtropical regions. The botanical features of Stomadena violacea make it a notable species for both horticultural and ecological studies.
